name: Dissonance (Dan 'Rain' Heller)
description:
“Most of the evil in this world is done by people with good intentions.” 
― T.S. Eliot

To those who have difficulty during that one level with the small narrow corridor to the end, try waiting in the bottom right until all the enemies appear, and then go for it.
